snippet: While their Yankee teammates were on the other side of Florida, the aging stars Derek Jeter, Mariano Rivera and Andy Pettitte moved closer to playing together again.
abstract: New York Yankees aging stars Derek Jeter, Mariano Rivera and Andy Pettitte workout together at team's spring training facility in Florida, preparing for what is likely to be their final season together after two immensely successful decades.
lead_paragraph: While their Yankee teammates were on the other side of Florida, the aging stars Derek Jeter, Mariano Rivera and Andy Pettitte moved closer to playing together again.

headline.seo: Jeter, Rivera and Pettitte Quietly Get Ready
headline.main: Three Men at Work, Quietly, While Yankees Are Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: Three Men at Work, Quietly, While Yankees Are Elsewhere
